thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Rita
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Rita

author: Rita
title: Rita
text:
Needed trainers for my daughter so went to the store. Unfortunately they did not have a shoe sizer in store which was a bit ridiculous. I was advised to try on different trainers to find her size. The staff ended up ordering the trainers online as they didn't have her size in stock. The order was placed after 4pm on a Saturday afternoon and I received them by lunchtime Monday. Very impressed with this turnaround.
I have since purchased other items online and have received them next day which is a great service.
Maybe it would be an idea if they had a shoe/foot sizer in stores (maybe they do, just not the one I went to). Other than that I would highly recommend.
